overview: Capricorn Solutions is a vibrant young recruitment consultancy firm addressing the recruitment needs of a large number of companies across industries in Chennai. The city of Chennai has been witnessing unprecedented growth in the Information technology, banking and automotive industries. Economic growth brings with it the demand for skilled manpower. We help companies meet this demand by finding appropriate skill sets locally. With the same zest and enthusiasm, we also help individuals find and settle down in careers of their choice.
